RumorFact.Text: Ore mined on Timber Hearth was treated at a forge on Hollow's Lantern.
A Nomai computer reported increased volcanic activity and unstable lava levels on Hollow's Lantern.

Ice taken from a nearby asteroid belt was sealed within a protective shell crafted from heat-resistant ore, and lowered into the deepest point of the lava pool as a final test of the ore's durability.

ExploreFact.Text: The Nomai lowered a diving bell crafted from heat-resistant ore into the lava at this site. They concluded that a protective shell crafted from this ore would be able to withstand a supernova.
Data from the Nomai's elders gave them knowledge of precise measurements of a supernova's temperatures.

A Nomai named Pye wondered if the ice within the diving bell would remain intact once properly tested against a supernova. Due to its compromised structure, another Nomai felt sure that the ice would melt.
